frontmatter.title: Baking In Configurability - Product Rewrite Story - Part 2
frontmatter.description: A real world blog series on a do-or-die product rewrite engagement from the trenches. This part talks about how we addressed the requirements of configurability and extensibility in the core of the platform.

frontmatter.description: A real world blog series on a do-or-die product rewrite engagement from the trenches.

frontmatter.title: Architecting For Continuous Delivery
frontmatter.description: Continuous Delivery is not just about selecting the right tools. The application should also be architected in a way to make it effective.

frontmatter.title: Trunk Based Development With Deployment Pipelines
frontmatter.description: The popular 'Gitflow' branching model causes more harm than good. How can we effectively develop and deploy software with confidence?
